#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

typedef long long LL;
LL n,t,r;
double p;

LL const MX=1000000ll;
double dp[MX+3*100000];
int main() {
#ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
    freopen("in.in", "r", stdin);
#endif

    ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(0);
    cout.tie(0);

    cin>>n>>p>>t>>r;
    n=min(n,MX-1);

    dp[n+1]=0;
    for(int x=n;x>=1;x--)
    {
        double k=1.0 / pow(x,p);
        dp[x]=k*(dp[x+t+r]+1) + (1.0-k)*(dp[x+t]);
    }

    cout<<setprecision(15)<<fixed<<dp[1]<<endl;

    return 0;
}
